alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Ellis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 9:04PM CDT until September 24 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Ellis County in north central Texas... South central Dallas County in north central Texas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 904 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Glenn Heights, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Dallas, Desoto, Cedar Hill, Duncanville, Lancaster, Waxahachie, Ennis, Midlothian, Glenn Heights, Red Oak, Wilmer, Ovilla, Ferris, Palmer, Oak Leaf, Bardwell, Bardwell Lake, Garrett, Bristol, and Pecan Hill. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35E between mile markers 396 and 420. Interstate 20 between mile markers 464 and 469. Interstate 45 between mile markers 251 and 267. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
